⊣ c0 =(Base ` c1)
⊣ c3 =((dist ` c1)|`(c0 × c0))
⊣ c2 =(UnifSt ` c1)

comment: If the uniform set of a complete metric space is the uniform structure generated by its metric, then it is a complete uniform space. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Dec-2017.)
